titleInfo.title: In memoriam: Nelson Aldrich Rockefeller, 1908-1979, Friday February 2, 1979, 11:00 a.m., the Riverside Church, New York, New York.
Memorial service for Nelson Aldrich Rockefeller.

mods.note: Includes: Words of commemoration by David Rockefeller; Selected readings by Ann Rockefeller Roberts and Rodman C. Rockefeller.

subject.topic: Rockefeller, Nelson A. (Nelson Aldrich), 1908-1979 -- Death and burial

mods.note: Copy 1: Estate of Laurance S. Rockefeller
